product_name: La Roche-PosayToleriane Double Repair Matte Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Matte Face Moisturizer is a daily oil-free, non-comedogenic face moisturizer for oily skin. This oily skin moisturizer provides all day hydration without the shine and helps to repair the skin barrier after 1-hour.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll day hydration without the shineHelps repair the skin barrier repair after 1 hourMinimizes the size of visible poresImproves skin textureReduces fine linesClinically tested to be well tolerated for use while using acne prescriptions commonly associated with harsh drying effectsDermatologist Tested for SafetyAllergy testedNon-comedogenicFormulated WithoutAlcoholOilParabenItem 2591830How To UseStep 1: After cleansing, apply to face and neckStep 2: Apply the moisturizer in gentle circular motionsStep 3: Repeat application process in the mornings and eveningsIngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Silica, Betaine, Niacinamide, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Zea Mays Starch / Corn Starch, Ceramide Np, Carbomer, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Perlite, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum.
how_to_use: Step 1: After cleansing, apply to face and neckStep 2: Apply the moisturizer in gentle circular motionsStep 3: Repeat application process in the mornings and evenings

reviews.headline: Does Not Blend
reviews.comments: This moisturizer sits on the top of my face and pills after about an hour. It does not make my face fee matte, but it does make it feel like the heat in my skin is being sealed in. It feels heavier than my sunscreen!

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: I'm very oily, i use the gel cleanser and this, problem solved.

reviews.headline: Great option
reviews.comments: Hey, so I overall like this product. The pilling I noticed is caused when I touch my skin, so it has been very helpful for me to get myself to not touch my face. Personally, the way I help with the pilling is to apply the moisturizer on a damp face, not a dry one. I also like to mix the product on my hands really nicely and apply it, not just put some on my hand and apply. I like to mix it up really good, and I have noticed it helps a lot to almost completely rid of the problem.

reviews.headline: Too drying
reviews.comments: I understand its a matte moisturizer but its the equivalent of putting a matte lipstick on your face. I love this brand but this is a no for me. If you prefer dry skin this is definitely for you

reviews.headline: It pills :(
reviews.comments:
I was so excited for this moisturizer because it had a good review from Wirecutter and I really needed a moisturizer that wouldn't make me look greasy!
My skin is acne prone and oily on my forehead and to the left and right of my nose but very dry under my nose and on my upper lip and chin. I was happy with how this moisturizer made my skin look (matte but not dull) and that it worked well on both the dry and oily parts of my face.
The unfortunate thing is that it pills a LOT, to the point that it bothers me enough that I don't want to wear it. I usually go barefaced and it still pills very badly. Putting sunscreen on top of it doesn't go very well and I imagine it would be worse with makeup. I'm really sad that it does this because I loved the product otherwise but now I have a nearly full tube of it that I can't wear which is a huge waste of money :(

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I bought this product and put it on at night and woke up with red, patchy and it itchy skin and my skin feels like sandpaper, if you have sensitive skin- avoid this product:(

reviews.headline: Awesome- no pores
reviews.comments: Its not formreally dry skin; i have normal skin, but with majorly large pores from years of extreme oiliness and sun damage. I was so sick of all koisturizers making my skin look worse, and now I have finally found the one that doesn't make me break out, and doesnt look shiny. I'm 62, for the record. Tip: don't tey to rub it in all the way or else it will pill. Just apply it, massage it a little bit, and let it soak in and dry on your skin.

reviews.headline: PLS STOP
reviews.comments:
please stop using the term "peels" whhen you mean it PILLS
beside that, word of advice use it on damp skin
that may help and if it still continues to PILL make sure you're using all your skincare ok DAMP TO WET SKIN
this moisturizer is great don't let other's user error influence you

reviews.headline: Def a repurchase
reviews.comments: Not heavy feeling on skin

reviews.headline: Good but peels
reviews.comments: It peels very easily and makes it look like your skin is flaking off.

reviews.headline: I like this produce
reviews.comments: I loved

reviews.headline: Peels
reviews.comments: It is a matte moisturizer but it peels

reviews.headline: Does okay…
reviews.comments: This product is great for a matte effect… to the point it drys out my skin somewhat. It does pill quite eaisy. I would also say it's not the best option for sensitive skin, as it made mine have red patches.

reviews.headline: Great for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I've used this product for a few years now. Not only does my extremely sensitive skin love it, it is rated excellent by apps that rate beauty products by the healthfulness of the ingredients.

reviews.headline: Great! But..,
reviews.comments: Excellent moisturizer for my combination skin. The reason for the 3 stars is that the tube is not full, it's deceiving!!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: Combo skin here, in my early 40's and my skin is hard to manage nowadays. This moisturizer is IT!! The only daily moisturizer that doesn't cause me breakouts & keeps me hydrated!!

reviews.headline: Trying it out.
reviews.comments: So far so good. I have oily skin and this does in fact make a difference in the amount of oil buildup (with or without makeup.) I'm hooked.

reviews.headline: Not the same
reviews.comments: I have used La Roche moisturizer before and this product does not compare. I do not have my receipt, but would like a refund or credit.

reviews.headline: No recommend it for oily skin
reviews.comments: If your skin is very greasy, it isn't for you. My skin is very greasy and every time I used this moisturizer it made my skin more greasy. Also, I never felt my skin moisturizer at all.

reviews.headline: LOVE IT
reviews.comments: Literlly only thing that helps.

media.headline: I am so sad
media.caption: Look at how oily me face looks

media.headline: You don't get what u paid for!
media.caption: Product half full already!

media.headline: You don't get what u paid for!
media.caption: Product half full

faceoff_positive.comments:
Been using it for the last 3 days and so far I notice it doesn't have a matte finish. I thought will have since it's for oily skin.
Besides that, the formula feels nice on my skin, I have no bad reactions to it. I do see some oils coming through on my T-zone, but not criminal. 
I'll use it every day and update my review if results change with every day use. 

PS: when I received the shipment, the box where moisturizer goes was broken (like in the picture) but the item was not damaged. Just want to mention so the company is more careful when shipping, to avoid any losses or angry customers.
faceoff_positive.headline: Not Matte Finish

faceoff_negative.comments: I received my order today and was so happy to try these products. However, I noticed the moisturizer had not even full. This I'm kind of disappointed because it's not giving me at least the what is worth. I think that using consistent in morning and nights it should probably lost about 2-1/2 weeks.? I then noticed that I suppose I'm not the only customer who this has happened to :(
faceoff_negative.headline: You don't get what u paid for!

rollup.name: Toleriane Double Repair Matte Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin
